{{Infobox Berry |name = #56 Custap |image = [[File:Custap.png]] |caption = The flesh underneath the Custap Berry's tough skin is sweet and creamy soft. |growtime = 7h 36m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.03% |points = 2,700 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *40 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Custap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of sweet on the field. The [[Watmel]] berry must be unlocked to obtain this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 54 mins || 2 hours 18 mins || 3 hours 42 mins || 7 hours 36 mins - 15 hours 12 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CustapTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CustapTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CustapTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 7 hours 36 mins -
15 hours 12 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 5 hours 4 mins -
10 hours 8 mins || 61 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 3 hours 22 mins 40 secs -
6 hours 45 mins 20 secs || 41 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Custap_Flow_Chart.png|250px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === '''WARNING:''' Trying to mutate Custap while having the [[Sprinklotad]] equipped may result in your Watmel berries mutating into [[Shuca]] berries.
You can fill your farm in the following ways to obtain Custap berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. ==== Watmel Mutation Strategy ==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 26px;" | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Watmel.png|30px]]
